sys_documentation.help: For an existing transaction, the user listed in this field is from the legacy trnsaction. For new transsactions or editing an existing transaction, in which this field is empty, the user selected in the requestor lookup will populate this field. When editing an existing transaction, in which this field is empty, the user selected in the will populate this field.
